page.title: 06Whitwell Quarry-Steetley
page.content: The Quarry was started in 1960.At present 180 people work at the Quarry and 41 of those come from Whitwell. Most of the material(dolomite)is made into steel, roads, concrete and fertilsers for farmers.It goes all over the country and some of it is exported.They take 5,000 tons of stone out each day.The Quarry will stay open to the year 2015.There will be the same number of people employed, but they will produce more stone.The Quarry receive some complaints about lorries and dust and occasionally complaints about the use of explosives.The men work from 0600 to 1600 some work all night.They have a fishing club,golf club and a cricket team.
